heisig_chinese_memo: The dude was so upset about going bald that he covered himself with a wheat sack so that only his legs were showing.
Ru_trainchinese: tū: (прил) лысый; голый; затупившийся; (о письме) незавершенный, неоконченный
Kanshudo_mnemonic: the grain (禾) has legs (儿) but is going bald
chinese_mnemonics_deck__story: As the old man works in the field with his wild rice the wind blows off his toupee revealing his bald head.
humanum_full_description_en:
The font of " bald " was first seen in Qin Yin and Qin Tao Wen and was used as a radical. The word " bald " starts from " He " and " Ren ". The same applies to the Chinese bamboo slips and the Chinese seal. Xiaozhuan " person " is transformed into " er ", which is the foundation of later generations. The original meaning of " bald " is not clear, but "Shuowen" takes the original meaning of having no hair. "Said Wen": "Bald, no hair." Such as "Spring and Autumn Valley Liang Chuan." "First Year of Cheng Gong": "Ji Sun Xing's father is bald, Jin Que Kesuan, Wei Sun Liangfu is lame, Cao Gongzi is hand-worn, and they are hired by Qi at the same time." To Count": "There are more bald and gall people in light water." The extension indicates that animals have no hair, as in "Han Shu. "Five Elements": "Emperor Zhao had a pelican or bald bird. His Royal Highness the King of Jichangyi, the king made people shoot him."

" Bald " also means that the mountain has no vegetation. Such as "Huainanzi. "Tao Ying": "Therefore, no grain grows on the stone, and the bald mountain does not swim with elk. There is no shade." "Lun Heng. Super Strange": "If the mountain is bald, who is it prosperous?" It also refers to the tree without branches and leaves. For example, Bai Juyi of the Tang Dynasty "He Dreaming in Spring": "The flowers are all withered, and the half-dead phoenix trees are bald."

" Bald " means not wearing a hat or shoes. Such as "Hou Han Shu. "The Biographies of Zheng Kongxun": "Incorporated into nine columns again, not following the rituals, the bald scarf walks slightly, and the Tang Tu palace is tucked." Li Xian's note: "It is said that there is no increase." Tang Dynasty Wen Tingyun's "Drunk Song": "Luoyang Lu, the same name In the study room, the wife's feet are bald and the yellow beam is pounded."

" Bald " also means that the object has no sharp points. For example, Li Bai of the Tang Dynasty "Gift to Wang Liyang from the Drunk Queen": "The book is bald with thousands of rabbits, and the poem cuts two cows." Southern Song Xin Qiji "Bu Shouzi. "Yeyu Drunken Melon House": "The bald rabbit has a cone, and the copper tile is pierced."
humanum_short_description_en: " bald " from this word " bluegrass ", from " people ," Xiao Zhuan " people " shaped into a " child " for the future generations of this. The original meaning of "Shuowen" is that there is no hair.
humanum_full_description:
「禿」的字形最早見於秦印、秦陶文中，作偏旁使用。「禿」字本從「禾」，從「人」，漢簡和漢印亦同。小篆「人」形變為「儿」，為後世所本。「禿」的構形初義不明，《說文》以為其本義是沒有頭髮。《說文》：「禿，無髮也。」如《春秋穀梁傳．成公元年》：「季孫行父禿、晉郤克眇、衛孫良夫跛、曹公子手僂，同時而聘於齊。」《呂氏春秋．盡數》：「輕水所多禿與癭人。」引申表示動物沒有毛，如《漢書．五行志》：「昭帝時有鵜鶦或曰禿鶖，集昌邑王殿下，王使人射殺之。」

　　「禿」也表示山無草木。如《淮南子．道應》：「是故石上不生五穀，禿山不游麋鹿，無所陰蔽也。」《論衡．超奇》：「山之禿也，孰其茂也？」又指樹無枝葉。如唐代白居易〈和夢遊春〉：「全凋蕣花折，半死梧桐禿。」

　　「禿」表示不戴帽、不穿鞋。如《後漢書．鄭孔荀列傳》：「又融為九列，不遵朝儀，禿巾微行，唐突宮掖。」李賢注：「謂不加幘。」唐代溫庭筠〈醉歌〉：「洛陽盧仝稱文房，妻子腳禿舂黃粱。」

　　「禿」還表示物體沒有尖端。如唐代李白〈醉後贈王歷陽〉：「書禿千兔毫，詩裁兩牛腰。」南宋辛棄疾〈卜算子．夜雨醉瓜廬〉：「禿盡兔毫錐，磨透銅臺瓦。」
humanum_short_description: 「禿」字本從「禾」，從「人」，小篆「人」形變為「儿」，為後世所本。《說文》以為其本義是沒有頭髮。

  • ⿱ Above to below
    • 禾 [ hé ] cereal, grain, rice; plant, stalk
    • 儿 [ ér ] son, child
①人無頭髮，山無樹木，樹木無枝葉：禿子。禿頭。禿頂。
②鳥羽毛脫落，物體失去尖端：禿鷲。禿筆。禿針。
③表示不圓滿、不周全：文章的開頭寫得有點禿。

「 禿 」的字形最早見於秦印、秦陶文中，作偏旁使用。「 禿 」字本從「 禾 」，從「 人 」，漢簡和漢印亦同。小篆「 人 」形變為「 儿 」，為後世所本。「 禿 」的構形初義不明，《說文》以為其本義是沒有頭髮。《說文》：「禿，無髮也。」如《春秋穀梁傳．成公元年》：「季孫行父禿、晉郤克眇、衛孫良夫跛、曹公子手僂，同時而聘於齊。」《呂氏春秋．盡數》：「輕水所多禿與癭人。」引申表示動物沒有毛，如《漢書．五行志》：「昭帝時有鵜鶦或曰禿鶖，集昌邑王殿下，王使人射殺之。」 「 禿 」也表示山無草木。如《淮南子．道應》：「是故石上不生五穀，禿山不游麋鹿，無所陰蔽也。」《論衡．超奇》：「山之禿也，孰其茂也？」又指樹無枝葉。如唐代白居易〈和夢遊春〉：「全凋蕣花折，半死梧桐禿。」 「 禿 」表示不戴帽、不穿鞋。如《後漢書．鄭孔荀列傳》：「又融為九列，不遵朝儀，禿巾微行，唐突宮掖。」李賢注：「謂不加幘。」唐代溫庭筠〈醉歌〉：「洛陽盧仝稱文房，妻子腳禿舂黃粱。」 「 禿 」還表示物體沒有尖端。如唐代李白〈醉後贈王歷陽〉：「書禿千兔毫，詩裁兩牛腰。」南宋辛棄疾〈卜算子．夜雨醉瓜廬〉：「禿盡兔毫錐，磨透銅臺瓦。」

The same applies to the Chinese bamboo slips and the Chinese seal. Xiaozhuan " person" is transformed into " er", which is the foundation of later generations. The original meaning of " bald" is not clear, but "Shuowen" takes the original meaning of having no hair. "Said Wen": "Bald, no hair." Such as "Spring and Autumn Valley Liang Chuan." "First Year of Cheng Gong": "Ji Sun Xing's father is bald, Jin Que Kesuan, Wei Sun Liangfu is lame, Cao Gongzi is hand-worn, and they are hired by Qi at the same time." To Count": "There are more bald and gall people in light water." The extension indicates that animals have no hair, as in "Han Shu. "Five Elements": "Emperor Zhao had a pelican or bald bird. His Royal Highness the King of Jichangyi, the king made people shoot him." " Bald" also means that the mountain has no vegetation. Such as "Huainanzi. Liushutong characters (3)

禿字的基本解释

禿
tū
同“秃”。

禿字的汉语字典释义

[①]［tū］
［《廣韻》他谷切，入屋，透。］
亦作“痜1”。亦作“禿1”。
(1)头无发。
(2)山无草木。
(3)不戴帽，不穿鞋。
(4)脱落，脱光。
(5)物体失去尖端，不锐利。
(6)詈词。指僧侣。

禿字的康熙字典解释

【午集下】【禾字部】　禿； 康熙笔画：7； 页码：页849第02
【唐韻】【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】?他谷切，通入聲。【說文】無髮也。从人，上象禾粟之形，取其聲。王育說：倉頡出，見禿人伏禾中，因以制字，未知其審。又【徐鍇曰】言禿人髮不纖長，若禾稼也。【穀梁傳·成元年】季孫行父禿，聘于齊，齊使禿者御之。【史記·灌夫傳】與長孺共一老禿翁。　又凡物落盡皆曰禿。【後漢·張衡傳】蘇武以禿節效貞。又【孔融傳】禿巾微行。【註】謂不加幘。又【杜甫詩】漱壑松柏禿。　又姓。祝融後八姓，禿居一。出【國語】。又複姓。南凉主禿髮烏孤。　又與鵚同。禿鶖，鳥名。

禿字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
禿字的起名意思

暂无。

Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［tū］
["Guangyun" He cuts, enters the house, and penetrates. ]
Also known as "Epilepsy 1". Also known as "bald 1".
(1) No hair on the head.
(2) The mountain has no vegetation.
(3) Do not wear hats and shoes.
(4) Shedding and stripping.
(5) The object loses its sharp point and is not sharp.
(6) Sorry words. Refers to monks.
bald
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Afternoon Set 2] [He Zi Department] 　 Bald; Kangxi strokes: 7; Page number: Page 849 02
[Tang Yun] [Ji Yun] [Rhyme Meeting] [Zheng Yun]? He cuts through the valley and enters the sound. [Said the text] No post. From the perspective of human beings, the shape is like a millet, and the sound is chosen. Wang Yu said: Cangjie came out and saw the bald man Fu Hezhong, because he was trying to make a character, his trial was unknown. [Xu Kai said] The hair of a bald person is not slender, just like hejia. [Guliang Chuan·The First Year of Cheng Cheng] Ji Sunxing's father was bald, and he was hired by Qi, and Qi made the bald person to be the master. [Historical Records · Guan Fu Biography] An old bald man with Chang Ru.　If everything falls away, it is said to be bald. [Later Han·Zhang Heng Biography] Su Wu used baldness as a virginity. And [Kong Rong Biography] The bald scarf is slightly walking. [Note] It means no increase. Also 【Poem of Du Fu】washing pine and cypress baldness.　Another last name. Zhu Rong has eight surnames, bald in one. Out [Mandarin]. Re-surname again. Lord Nanliang is bald and lonely.　Same as Yu again. Bald bird, the name of the bird.
